Liushutong characters (3)

竆字的基本解释

竆
qióng
古同“穷”。

竆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qióng］
［《廣韻》渠弓切，平東，羣。］
亦作“竆1”。“穷1”的繁体字。
(1)尽，完。
(2)终端；终极。
(3)理屈；辞屈。
(4)空。
(5)贫苦。
(6)困窘；窘急。
(7)特指不得志。与“达”相对。
(8)指鳏、寡、孤、独四种无依靠的人。
(9)不肖的人；恶人。
(10)彻底推求；深入钻研。
(11)查究。
(12)揭穿；识破。
(13)止息；杜绝。
(14)不足；缺陷。
(15)荒僻；边远。参见“窮邊”、“窮域”。
(16)小；浅。参见“窮徑”、“窮流”。
(17)大。参见“窮怒”、“窮”。
(18)高。参见“窮陸”、“窮墉”。
(19)破旧；破烂。
(20)副词。最，非常。
(21)通“穹”。参见“窮廬”。
(22)古国名。
[②]［gōng］
［《集韻》居雄切，平東，見。］
通“躬1”。“穷2”的繁体字。
身体。

竆字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　竆； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页869第09
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】渠弓切【正韻】渠宮切，?音?。與窮同。【說文】作竆，極也。【禮·檀弓】充充如有窮。【註】事盡理屈爲窮。言孝子心形充曲，如急行道極，竆急之容也。【韓詩外傳】獸窮則齧，鳥窮則啄，人窮則詐。【楚辭·九歌】橫四海兮焉窮。【註】窮，極也。　又竟也。【易·臨卦】君子以敎思無窮。【書·微子之命】與國咸休，永世無窮。　又究也。【杜預·春秋序】究其所窮。【疏】言窮盡其所窮之處也。　又塞也。【孟子】遁辭知其所窮。【註】困屈也。　又人名。【左傳·文十八年】少皡氏有不才子，天下之民謂之窮奇。　又獸名。【山海經】邽山有獸，名窮奇，音如獋狗。是食人。又狀如虎，有翼。【神異經】西北有獸，有翼能飛，知人言語，聞人鬭，輒食直者。聞人忠信，輒食其鼻。聞人惡逆不善，輒殺獸往饋之。名曰窮奇。　又地名。【山海經】軒轅之國，在此窮山之際。【帝王世紀】黃帝自窮桑登位。【晉地記】河南有窮國。【竹書紀年】荀瑤伐中山取窮魚之丘。【莊子·逍遙遊】窮髮之北有冥海者，天池也。【屈

竆
Basic explanation of words
竆
qióng
Gu Tong is "poor".
竆
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qióng］
["Guangyun" Qu Gongqie, Pingdong, Qun. ]
Also known as "竆1". The traditional characters of "Poor 1".
(1) End, end.
(2) Terminal; ultimate.
(3) Reasons and speeches.
(4) Empty.
(5) Poverty.
(6) Embarrassment; embarrassment.
(7) Specifically refers to unwilling. Contrast with "Da".
(8) Refers to the four types of people who are widowed, widowed, lonely, and alone.
(9) Unscrupulous people; wicked people.
(10) Thoroughly seek; in-depth study.
(11) Investigate.
(12) Expose; see through.
(13) Stop; put an end to it.
(14) Insufficiency; defect.
(15) Lonely; remote. See "poor side", "poor domain".
(16) Small; shallow. See "poor path", "poor flow".
(17) Big. See "poor anger", "poor ".
(18) High. See "poor land" and "poor land".
(19) Dilapidated; tattered.
(20) Adverbs. Most, very much.
(21) Through the "dome". See "poor house".
(22) Ancient country names.
[②]［gōng］
["Jiyun" Juxiongqie, Pingdong, see you. ]
Same as "Bow 1". "Poor 2" in traditional characters.
body.
竆
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Acupoint Word Department] 　竆; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 869 No. 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Qu Gong Qi [Zheng Yun] Qu Gong Qi, "Yin". Same with poverty. [Speaking of the text] It's very good to make a fortune. [Li·Tan Gong] Full as poor. 【Note】If everything is reasonable, it will be poor. Saying a filial son has a heart-shaped heart shape, like a rush, and an eagerness. [Han Shiwai Biography] Poor beasts will bite, birds will peck if they are poor, and people will deceive if they are poor. [Songs of Chu·Nine Songs] Poor in all directions. [Note] Poor, extremely.　 Actually again. 【Yi·Lin Gua】A gentleman can think endlessly. 【Book·The Life of the Weizi】Have a close relationship with the country, forever.　Research also. [Du Yu·Spring and Autumn Preface] Find out what is poor. 【Sparse】The words are exhausted.　Still again. [Mencius] Escape to know what he is poor. [Note] Distressed too.　Another name. [Zuo Zhuan·Eighteenth Year of Wen] There are talented scholars in the Shaohao family, and the people of the world are called poor and strange.　Also the animal name. [Shan Hai Jing] There are beasts in Yunshan, whose names are poor and strange, and their sounds are like roe-dogs. It is cannibalism. It looks like a tiger and has wings. [Sutra of Wonders] There are beasts in the northwest, with wings that can fly, knowing people's words, smelling people, and being straightforward. Wen people are loyal, and eat their noses. Hearing that people are evil and rebellious, they will kill the beast to feed it. The name is Qiongqi.　Also place name. [Shan Hai Jing] The country of Xuanyuan, in this poor mountain. [Emperor Century] Huangdi came to the throne from poor Sang. [Jin Di Ji] There are poor countries in Henan. [Zhu Shu Ji Nian] Xun Yao cut down Zhongshan to take the hill of poor fish. [Zhuangzi·Xiaoyaoyou] There are people in the north of the poor, and Tianchi is also. 【Qu
